summary: A 1999 JEEP  GRAND CHEROKEE WITH 28000 MILES DEVELOPED A GRINDING NOISE IN THE RIGHT FRONT WHEEL. UPON  INSPECTION AT A LOCAL SERVICE STATION IT WAS FOUND THAT ALL FOUR ROTORS ON THE VEHICLE WERE CRACKED.I  CONTACTED CHRYSLER CUSTOMER ASSISTANCE TO INFORM THEM OF THE PROBLEM AND A DANGEROUS SITUATION AND WAS INFORMED THAT SINCE THE WARRANTY WAS ONLY 12,000MILES , THAT THERE WAS NOTHING THEY WOULD DO. I FEEL THAT THIS IS A VERY DANGEROUS SITUATION AND THAT THE ROTORS WERE PROBABLY DEFECTIVE FROM THE MANUFACTURER.
